summary: REQ-1 appears to be implemented via CSS updates in `frontend/src/index.css` to make planned-moment pill cards slimmer/more elongated while keeping the border-only moment.color-based styling. However, the actual planned-moment CSS section is not visible in the truncated `index.css` excerpt, so verification relies on the diff summary text. Two additional non-requested metadata/documentation files were also modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/documentation files (`frontend-file-summaries.txt`, `project_state.json`) even though the BuildRequest only asked for CSS changes to planned-moment card styling.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest requirements and constraints focus on styling changes in `frontend/src/index.css` for planned-moment card classes; it does not request updates to repository summary/state files.
